page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: Today its very modern in farming,but in the olden days it must have been hard.These days we have tractors to pull the big trailers and today we have ploughs that the tractors pull as well.They grow things like grass and make it into hay or silage and mustard and barley.On farms nowadays there are machines like tractors and combine harvesters.We sow the seeds with the tractors using a seed drill.The straw we bale with the tractors and a baling machine. When we cut fields for hay we cut it, lay it, then turn it over, then turn,it then bale it.We use the hay for feeding for the sheep and cattle.
